name: Exemption from fee and tag
text: Any bicycle brought into the State shall be exempt from the payment of fees and display of State of Hawaii bicycle tag for the remaining period for which the taxes or fees have been paid on such bicycle in compliance with the law of the state or country from which it was brought, if the bicycle displays a tag for the current year as required by the law of such state or country. [L 1983, c 272, §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1988, c 264, §2]
